name: Stone Gazer
description:
Work in progress - top down 2d puzzle game

Stone Gazer is a thriller puzzle game in which you must trap the stonemen who hunt you while keeping your touch lit. The stonemen will only be able to move when you are not shining your tourch at them. You can trap them by moving the blocks around the room to ensure that they can't move. 

You can gather energy orbs around each room to increase the power in your torch and whenever you trap a stoneman an energy orb will be generated somewhere in the room. 

-There is currently no set objective other then to survive for as long as possible.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

WASD to change the direction you are facing

Space bar followed by an arrow key to destroy a block (Note: this will use up energy)

Ctrl to use an energy orb and boost tourch brightness.

Esc to quit
